title: Historian on a photograph workers - continuity

content.question: Which of the following is one important continuity in urban life in the United States throughout the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Anarchism and similar radical ideologies attracted many workers.
Settlement houses assisted immigrants with adapting to life in the United States.
Workers and employers consistently maintained amicable relationships.
Immigrants formed an important part of the manufacturing workforce.

content.answer: Immigrants formed an important part of the manufacturing workforce.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
